/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the highway, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The highway itself is divided by a concrete barrier, providing a sense of safety and order. On either side of the highway, there are trees and buildings, adding a touch of urban life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a unique perspective, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the scene.
